name: Out Of My Mind
content: You pretend that you don't know
All the things that you do
You did wrong
And now before me lies a ghost
All I loved went up in smoke
In smoke
But my heart still wants you
And I don't wanna miss you
Tonight tonight
And I just wanna erase you
From my life
Get you out of my mind of my mind
And I don't wanna miss you
Tonight tonight
And I just wanna erase you
From my life
Get you out of my mind of my mind
But you haven't won this fight
And I hate the people we've become
But my heart still wants you
And I don't wanna miss you
Tonight tonight
And I just wanna erase you
From my life
Of my mind
And I don't wanna miss you
Tonight tonight
And I just wanna erase you
From my life
Get you out of my mind of my mind
But my heart still wants you
But my heart still wants you
